#Text=George
#Text=Bush completes his Middle East tour
#Text=Wednesday , January 16 , 2008
#Text=President
#Text=Bush
#Text=ended his Middle East tour after a show of support for the Israeli - Palestinian peace process from Egyptian President Hosni Mubarak .
#Text=President Bush began his Middle East tour in Israel , where he sought to encourage the peace process .
#Text=He ended it in Egypt , one of only two Arab states that recognizes the state of Israel .
#Text=Relations between the Israeli and Egyptian governments have been tense lately .
#Text=But President Mubarak says he supports Israel 's efforts to reach a deal on the creation of a Palestinian state .
#Text=Speaking through a translator , he endorsed the goal of reaching an agreement by the end of the year .

#Text=" We are ready , hand in hand with the United States of America and the quartet and all other regional and international stakeholders and parties to work for the sake of a comprehensive and just peace , to put an end to this Israeli-Palestinian conflict , to open new horizons for the Middle East , " Mr. Mubarak said .
#Text=During a joint appearance before reporters at the conclusion of their consultations in Sharm El-Sheikh , President Bush said he believes peace is possible .
#Text=But he warned it will not happen if Arab leaders turn away .

#Text=" I am optimistic an agreement can be reached , and the reason I am is because I believe the leadership of Israel and the leadership of the Palestinians is committed to a two state solution , " Mr. Bush said .
#Text=" And I know nations in the neighborhood are willing to help .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=Mr. Bush said once again that he is committed to the process , and he said people in the region can rest assured he will remain engaged .

#Text=In a final message before ending the tour Mr. Bush said  If they wonder whether or not the American president when he says something , he actually means it .

column1: #Text=And when I say I am optimistic we can get a deal done , I mean what I am saying .
#Text="
